pageContext.claim: “I think the Mueller scam is just exactly what it's -- what a lot of people are calling, because it was started illegally. It was started by abuse. It was phony. It was a fake dossier. And they went in, and they went into the FISA courts and they forged papers, and they did a lot of bad things.”
pageContext.analysis: The Mueller investigation was not a scam and was not started illegally. The FBI probe into contacts between Russia and the Trump campaign was not sparked by the dossier assembled by a former British spy, but sprang from a tip provided by the Australian government.
